itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway do their annual ESPN mock Fantasy Football Draft live on air, give you their sleeper picks, go over draft strategy, and close out the show with NBA playoff bets and guess where Lionel Messi will play next.
